Home.title: Stop Bullying
Home.description: It's okay to feel hurt, angry, or sad. Suppressing your emotions can make healing harder. Talk to someone you trust and surround yourself with those who uplift you.
Home.consolationDescription: We understand that being bullied can be a traumatic experience. It's important to remember that you are not alone. There are people who care about you and want to help you.
Home.consolationDescription2: We are here to support you. We are here to help you. We are here to listen to you.

Form.title: Stop Bullying Form
Form.description: Please fill out the form below to help us understand your experience and support you better. Your data will remain saved even if you change languages.

Team.title: Team Top10 | Ibn Batouta High School
Team.description: We are a team of students from Ibn Batouta High School who are passionate about helping others. We are here to support you.
